name: Upong
description: It is a fast reaction game. Where you are trying to push the ball as far as you can for a high score. You can use only small rocket (like in Pong). There are levels with different difficulty of obstacles. And you collect different power-ups which helps you get a better score. Game have retro black and white design, but you can buy new colors. Earn money and spend them for upgrades of pad and power-ups (size, color, design, etc.).
